basics.name: Alyssa Mencel
basics.label: Shidler Undergraduate
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.B.A in Management Information Systems and Marketing in the Shidler College of Business at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

education.institution: Shidler College of Business | University of Hawaii at Manoa
education.area: Marketing and Management Information Systems (expected Spring, 2022)
